attributes.action: INTRODUCE RATIONING OF ESSENTIALS DURING THE COVID 19 CRISIS
attributes.additional_details: To ensure sufficient supply of essential products such as Toilet paper, Soap & Paracetamol and reduce unnecessary impact on vulnerable people (elderly, infirm etc) and the wider population.
attributes.background: As the public are not heeding the advice to think of others when purchasing, retailers need to be mandated to implement restrictions
